value.title: How to enable the Single Value option in a Power BI slicer
value.excerpt: This video describes how to enable the Single Value slicer option in Power BI by adding additional metadata to the model with Tabular Editor. Article and download: https://sql.bi/728090?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: How to return BLANK instead of zero
value.excerpt: How to return BLANK instead of zero in a DAX measure: Using this technique, you can remove rows in a Power BI matrix visual where the result of a measure is zero. Article and download: https://sql.bi/745368?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to

value.title: Introducing LOOKUPVALUE
value.excerpt: This video shows how to use LOOKUPVALUE, which is a handy function for any developer to have in their toolbelt. Article and download: https://sql.bi/670595?aff=yt Additional resources: Expanded tables (article): https://sql.bi/65647?aff=yt

value.title: Introducing Performance Analyzer in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Performance Analyzer is the first diagnostic tool to find the slower parts of a report. Find the slowest DAX query before starting a deeper investigation using DAX Studio. How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/ DAX Studio: https://daxstudio.org/

value.title: Star schema or single table in Power BI
value.excerpt: Is it better to build a model as a regular star schema or as a single table in Power BI? The answer is clear: a star schema is always the best choice. This video analyzes the performance differences of the two approaches. Article and download: https://sql.bi/704257?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qEWrYO1ioe0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: USERELATIONSHIP in calculated columns
value.excerpt: Learn why USERELATIONSHIP is easy to work with in measures, but it can be challenging and give you inaccurate results when used in calculated columns. Article and download: {short_related_link}?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Using CONCATENATEX in DAX
value.excerpt: This video showcases the use of CONCATENATEX, a handy DAX function to return a list of values in a measure. Article and download: https://sql.bi/206871

value.title: Prepare data for tabular models in Power BI
value.excerpt: Prepare data for tabular models in Power BI

topItems.title: Choose a Power BI model framework
topItems.excerpt: Describe Power BI data model frameworks, their benefits and limitations, and features to help optimize your Power BI data models.

topItems.title: Understand scalability in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Scalable data models enable enterprise-scale analytics in Power BI. Implement data modeling best practices, use large dataset storage format, and practice building a star schema to design analytics solutions that can scale.

topItems.title: Create and manage scalable Power BI dataflows
topItems.excerpt: Create Power BI transformation logic for reuse across your organization with Power BI dataflows. Learn how to combine Power BI dataflows with Power BI Premium for scalable ETL, and practice creating and consuming dataflows.

value.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Choose a Power BI model framework
value.excerpt: Describe Power BI data model frameworks, their benefits and limitations, and features to help optimize your Power BI data models.

value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos
value.excerpt: Explore the capabilities of Power Platform applications, as seen in demonstrations and customer case studies.

value.title: Introduction to foundations in data modeling
value.excerpt: This module introduces the key concepts that are related to developing a well-organized data model.

value.title: Design interactive data experiences with Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Power BI enables report authors to produce interactive reports using visuals, slicers, bookmarks, and more.

value.title: Transition from Excel to Power BI
value.excerpt: Microsoft's Power BI combines the Power Query's extraction, transformation, and loading capabilities with DAX and a relational data model in a new application with new features.

value.title: Understand the Power BI administrator role
value.excerpt: Learn how to administer Power BI to support business decisions backed by data.

value.title: Configure Power BI report filters
value.excerpt: Report filtering is a complex topic because many techniques are available for filtering a Microsoft Power BI report. However, with complexity comes control, allowing you to design reports that meet requirements and expectations.

value.title: Enhance Power BI report designs for the user experience
value.excerpt: Enhance Power BI report designs for the user experience

value.title: Connect data to Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module provides the foundational information needed to connect to your data confidently with the new platform.

value.title: Introduction to Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module explores how Microsoft Power BI and Tableau connect to data and help you build visualizations.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Change The Font  Across All Visuals in a Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly change all the text in Power BI with the theme options in Power BI
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OsNCY66fgT0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: DAX Table Functions: ALL, FILTER, & VALUES
value.excerpt: Learn how to incorporate DAX Table functions in Power BI with real world scenarios. Also learn how to quickly add these functions in to dynamic calculations in DAX.

value.title: Decision Tree Classifier - Machine Learning in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a machine learning decision tree classifier in Power BI with some simple code. In the tutorial you will learn how to modify and visualize the model output so that you get the best results  This will be achieved with simple Python code.
